author: Tim O'Brien
title: Northern Ireland waives plastic bag tax for deliveries of groceries
description: Authorities in the Republic have said they will not be following the example of the North’s Department of Environment in waiving the plastic bag tax during the coronavirus outbreak. Earlier this week the North’s Environment and Rural Affairs Minister Edwin Po…
content:
Authorities in the Republic have said they will not be following the example of the Norths Department of Environment in waiving the plastic bag tax during the coronavirus outbreak.
